subject: Interest of recovery of mobilization advances/ payment of additional advances
text: Hrraiy 7emu RTTTAT qiferarut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (Te6 ART6 &r {rTMTf #iet4) Extn_ 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Owarka, New Delhi-110045 No. 11041/21/2002/Admn-III February 26, 2004 POLICY MATTERS-ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE (74/2004) (Decision taken on Finance Division file No. NHAIF& A/Policy Matters/2003/210) number   of  decisions have been  taken on a case to case basis for deferment of recovery of mobilization advances or for payment of additional advances subject to interest charged at SBI PLR In this regard, a number of references have been received from the PIUs seeking clarification as to whether the interest is to be charged at fixed rate or at floating rate of interest 2 It is clarified that the interest be charged at SBI PLR prevailing on the date of release without any provision for interest reset: & [V.KSharma] General Manager (Admn.) All Members AlI CGMslevoleeD/GMs All DGMsMManagers AIlI PIUs/CMUs/SPVs for information to: PS to Chairman Librarian/Hindi Officer Director (Audit); RAP, NHAI 47'1 VHAI being Copy
